I was thinking to remove it from users#edit alltogether – at least for the time being.

I think my idea of including it there was so that applicants can already start filling out their info while they are still looking for a team mate. Is this is a use case? I don't know. For the sake of simplicity, I am willing to let that doubious feature fall.

body:
I was thinking to remove it from `users#edit` alltogether – at least for the time being.

I _think_ my idea of including it there was so that applicants can already start filling out their info while they are still looking for a team mate. Is this is a use case? I don't know. For the sake of simplicity, I am willing to let that doubious feature fall.
